prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Reed, Bass, Piano, Drums, but without Guitar.
captions:
Style 1:

This piece of music features Reed, Piano, Bass, and Drums, but no Guitar.

Style 2:

This song is composed of Reed, Bass, Piano, and Drums, omitting the Guitar.

Style 3:

Guitar is absent from this song, which instead includes Reed, Bass, Piano, and Drums.
